summary: Patches to make some NPC and race mods work togheter. Ethereal Elven Overhaul compatibility with USKP 2.0 and Race and Gender Heights. Decent Women compatibility with USPK 2.0, XVision Children Redone and Race and Gender Heights.
descriptionHtml:
This mod is a small collection of hand made patches for NPC and race mods that I use in my own game.

The patches are divided into Elves and NPC:
Ethereal Elven Overhaul Patch Gender and Race Heights:
deals with elven races and npcs. Pass USKP 2.0 changes to ethereal elven overhaul altered npcs and passing Gender and Race Heights to elven races.

Ethereal Elven Overhaul Patch Gender and Race Heights + Cultural Diversity + Bosmer Armor:
Integrates Ethereal Elven Overhaul, USKP, Gender and Race Heights, Cultural Diversity Dunmer Clothes and Armor and Bosmer Armor Pack NPC.

Decent Women NPC Patch + Gender and Race Heights + XVision Children Redone:
deals with non elven races passing values from Gender and Race Heights to XVision Children Redone children races, also passes USKP 2.0 changes to Decent Women Commoners npcs.

NPCs Redone + Gender and Race Heights + XVision Children Redone + Cultural Diversity:
deals with non elven races passing values from Gender and Race Heights to XVision Children, also sets outfits from Cultural Diversity Khajiit Clothes and Khajiit Armor plugins to NPCs Redone Khajiit.

Children Gender and Race Heights:
Patch for XVision Children Redone to use Gender and Race Heights Dawnguard.

NPC fixed by Consistent Older People are not edited on NPC Patch so both can be loaded after Consistent Older People with no worries.
NPC children are also left out of NPC Patch purpose so it's compatible with XVision Children USKP patch or Prince and Pauper with ot without Prince and Pauper XVision Children patch.

Requirements (check the Requirements tab above for nexus links):
Ethereal Elven Overhaul Patch requires:
Requires: Dawnguard, Ethereal Elven Overhaul, Unofficial Skyrim Patch 2.0+, Gender and Race Heights Dawnguard

Ethereal Elven Overhaul Patch CulDivBosA requires:
Dawnguard, Ethereal Elven Overhaul, Unofficial Skyrim Patch 2.0 +, Gender and Race Heights Dawnguard, Cultural Diversity Dunmer Clothes and Armor, Bosmer Armor Pack

Decent Women NPC Patch:
Requires: Dawnguard, Decent Women Commoners (no need to load the esp), Unofficial Skyrim Patch 2.0+, Gender and Race Heights Dawnguard

NPCs Redone Patch requires:
Requires: Dawnguard, Dragonborn, Unofficial Skyrim Patch 2.0+, Gender and Race Heights Dawnguard, NPCs Redone, Cultural Diversity Khajiit Clothes and Khajiit Armor plugins.

Children Gender and Race Heights requires:
Dawnguard, XVision Children Redone, Gender and Race Heights Dawnguard

In my game I use then both and load order is following:
...
Unofficial Skyrim Patch.esp
XVision Children.esm
...
[DW Commoners.esp (not active, meshed and textures must be overwritten by Consistent Older People)] -> use this one or NPCs Redone.esp
PrinceandPauper.esp
[NPCs Redone.esp] -> use this one or DW Commoners.esp
[MXP] NPC Gender and Race Heights + Dawnguard.esp
SPTConsistentOlderPeople.esp (meshes and textures must be overwritten by Ethereal Elven Overhaul)
ethereal_elven_overhaul.esp
XVision Children - PaP.esp
[DW NPC Patch.esp] -> use this one or NPCs Redone Patch.esp
[NPCs Redone Patch.esp] -> use this one or DW NPC Patch.esp
Ethereal Elven Overhaul Patch.esp
...

Know Issues:
Face Meshes/Textures
Mind the order you install face textures/meshes from the mods you are patching: if you want NPCs Redone with Ethereal Elven elves, you must overwrite face textures in the same order.

Player Headtracking (contributed by aareyn)
The EEO patch interferes with the "Player Headtracking" mod, how you fix this is you place this patch directly below EEO and download http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25121 "Player Headtracking fixes" and place it just below the patch.

[b]Credits and thanks: [/b]
For all mods which those patches apply the credit go for respective mod authors. Dont forget to endorse their mods, for without their hard work, we would not be able to have this wonderful modded game of ours.

Bosmer Armor by maty743
Cultural Diversity by mjharper
Decent Women by FurArmor
Ethereal Elven Overhaul by nuska
Gender and Race Heights by Machienzo
NPCs Redone by Morphion
Unofficial Skyrim Patch by Arthmoor and the USKP team
XVision Children Redone by Bagserk and Bugsbugme

Thanks for authors of mods involved in this patch and to Bethesda for making Skyrim a modable game.
author: Agnusthemagi
